Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Classes

  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.codice.ddf.configuration.ConfigurationWatcher
    As of 2.8.0, replaced by using system properties. See SystemBaseUrl and SystemInfo
    ddf.catalog.util.Describable
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.codice.ddf.configuration.impl.ConfigurationWatcherImpl
    As of 2.8.0, Use SystemBaseUrl and SystemInfo instead
    ddf.catalog.federation.impl.FifoFederationStrategy
    This federation strategy has been left for historical purposes. Refer to the CachingFederationStrategy provided by the catalog-core-standardframework bundle.
    ddf.catalog.impl.filter.FuzzyFunction 
    ddf.security.common.util.Security
    As of release 2.9.0, replaced by Security
    ddf.catalog.federation.impl.SortedFederationStrategy
    This federation strategy has been left for historical purposes. Refer to the CachingFederationStrategy provided by the catalog-core-standardframework bundle.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    ddf.catalog.event.EventProcessor.EVENT_METACARD
    This constant is implementation specific and will be removed from API
    ddf.catalog.event.EventProcessor.EVENT_OLD_METACARD
    This constant is implementation specific and will be removed from API
    ddf.catalog.event.EventProcessor.EVENT_TIME
    This constant is implementation specific and will be removed from API
    ddf.catalog.Constants.EVENTS_ENTRY_NAME
    Use EventProcessor.EVENT_METACARD instead
    ddf.catalog.Constants.EVENTS_TIME_NAME
    Use EventProcessor.EVENT_TIME instead
    ddf.catalog.Constants.EVENTS_TOPIC_CREATED
    Use EventProcessor.EVENTS_TOPIC_CREATED instead
    ddf.catalog.event.EventProcessor.EVENTS_TOPIC_CREATED
    This constant is implementation specific and will be removed from API
    ddf.catalog.Constants.EVENTS_TOPIC_DELETED
    Use EventProcessor.EVENTS_TOPIC_DELETED instead
    ddf.catalog.event.EventProcessor.EVENTS_TOPIC_DELETED
    This constant is implementation specific and will be removed from API
    ddf.catalog.Constants.EVENTS_TOPIC_UPDATED
    Use EventProcessor.EVENTS_TOPIC_UPDATED instead
    ddf.catalog.event.EventProcessor.EVENTS_TOPIC_UPDATED
    This constant is implementation specific and will be removed from API
    ddf.catalog.data.Metacard.SECURITY_MATCH_ALL
    Not to be used anymore, replaced with SECURITY attribute.
    ddf.catalog.data.Metacard.SECURITY_MATCH_ONE
    Not to be used anymore, replaced with SECURITY attribute.
    ddf.catalog.Constants.SERVICE_SHORTNAME
    use Constants.SERVICE_ID
    ddf.catalog.Constants.SORT_POLICY_VALUE_DISTANCE
    Use Result.DISTANCE instead
    ddf.catalog.Constants.SORT_POLICY_VALUE_RELEVANCE
    Use Result.RELEVANCE instead
    ddf.catalog.Constants.SORT_POLICY_VALUE_TEMPORAL
    Use the appropriate temporal field from Metacard
    ddf.catalog.data.Metacard.SOURCE_ID

    Will be removed in the next release.
    ddf.catalog.impl.CatalogFrameworkImpl.getResourceOptions(String, String)

    As of release 2.9.0, replaced by Security.getSecurityManager()

  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description

    - only to provide support for deprecated FifoFederationStrategy and SortedFederationStrategy
